title: GSTR-1 Filing
description: Monthly return for outward supplies
penalty: Rs. 50/day (max Rs. 10,000)

title: GSTR-3B Filing
description: Monthly summary return with self-assessed tax payment
penalty: Rs. 50/day (max Rs. 10,000) + 18% interest on tax due

title: GSTR-9 Annual Return
description: Annual consolidated return for all GST registered taxpayers
penalty: Rs. 200/day (max 0.50% of turnover)

title: AOC-4 Filing (Financial Statements)
description: Filing of financial statements with the Registrar of Companies
penalty: Rs. 100/day for each day of default

title: MGT-7 Annual Return
description: Annual return filing with Registrar of Companies
penalty: Rs. 100/day for each day of default

title: ADT-1 (Auditor Appointment)
description: Intimation of auditor appointment within 15 days of AGM
penalty: Rs. 300/day (max Rs. 12,00,000 for company)

title: DIR-3 KYC (Director KYC)
description: Annual KYC verification for all directors holding DIN
penalty: Rs. 5,000 for late filing; DIN deactivation

title: TDS Return - Q1 (Apr-Jun)
description: Quarterly TDS return for deductions made during April to June
penalty: Rs. 200/day under Section 234E; penalty up to Rs. 1,00,000 under Section 271H

title: TDS Return - Q2 (Jul-Sep)
description: Quarterly TDS return for deductions made during July to September
penalty: Rs. 200/day under Section 234E; penalty up to Rs. 1,00,000 under Section 271H

title: TDS Return - Q3 (Oct-Dec)
description: Quarterly TDS return for deductions made during October to December
penalty: Rs. 200/day under Section 234E; penalty up to Rs. 1,00,000 under Section 271H

title: TDS Return - Q4 (Jan-Mar)
description: Quarterly TDS return for deductions made during January to March
penalty: Rs. 200/day under Section 234E; penalty up to Rs. 1,00,000 under Section 271H

title: PF (Provident Fund) Payment
description: Monthly provident fund contribution remittance to EPFO
penalty: 12% interest per annum + damages up to 100% of arrears

title: ESI Contribution Payment
description: Monthly ESI contribution remittance to ESIC
penalty: 12% interest per annum + damages

title: Advance Tax - 1st Instalment
description: First instalment of advance tax (minimum 15% of estimated tax liability)
penalty: Interest under Section 234B and 234C

title: Advance Tax - 2nd Instalment
description: Second instalment of advance tax (cumulative 45% of estimated tax liability)
penalty: Interest under Section 234B and 234C

title: Advance Tax - 3rd Instalment
description: Third instalment of advance tax (cumulative 75% of estimated tax liability)
penalty: Interest under Section 234B and 234C

title: Advance Tax - 4th Instalment
description: Final instalment of advance tax (100% of estimated tax liability)
penalty: Interest under Section 234B and 234C

title: ITR Filing (Individuals / Non-Audit)
description: Income tax return filing for individuals and entities not requiring audit
penalty: Rs. 5,000 (Rs. 1,000 if income below Rs. 5 lakh) under Section 234F

title: ITR Filing (Audit Cases)
description: Income tax return filing for entities requiring tax audit under Section 44AB
penalty: Rs. 5,000 under Section 234F + penalty for non-audit

title: Board Meeting - Q1
description: Quarterly board meeting (minimum 4 per year, gap not exceeding 120 days)
penalty: Rs. 25,000 per director; officer in default: Rs. 1,00,000

title: Board Meeting - Q2
description: Quarterly board meeting (minimum 4 per year, gap not exceeding 120 days)
penalty: Rs. 25,000 per director; officer in default: Rs. 1,00,000

title: Board Meeting - Q3
description: Quarterly board meeting (minimum 4 per year, gap not exceeding 120 days)
penalty: Rs. 25,000 per director; officer in default: Rs. 1,00,000

title: Board Meeting - Q4
description: Quarterly board meeting (minimum 4 per year, gap not exceeding 120 days)
penalty: Rs. 25,000 per director; officer in default: Rs. 1,00,000

title: GST TDS Payment & Return (GSTR-7)
description: Monthly GST TDS deduction payment and return for government entities and specified persons
penalty: Rs. 50/day (max Rs. 10,000) + 18% interest

title: PF ECR Filing
description: Monthly Electronic Challan cum Return filing for PF contributions
penalty: Damages as per EPFO damage schedule
